content: i thought it was about time to make a matching hat for my popular jeannie blanket ~ which i wrote in memory of a wonderful knitter who inspired many others after rediscovering a love of knitting at the age of 89 it is an easy-to-knit pattern and i think it looks really great each little hat requires dk yarn ~ around 14g 4mm needles there are now 3 sizes large premature baby / small newborn 0 - 3 months and 6 months worked flat and then seamed **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
